item.title: üåò AI Roundtables @lunar.dev
item.description:
Thank You, Lunar Team

Before diving into all the AI insights: thanks Eyal Solomon (aka Luli, CEO) and Roy Gabbay (aka Gabbay, CTO), and Rotem (VP R&D), from lunar.dev for arranging these meetups and letting me be a part of what y’all are building. Leading the charge on AI thought leadership is hard with so much BS in the air.

I definitely learned a ton, met cool folks from the industry, and even had fun. So thanks! üôè

item.title: AI-assisted API Design ü§ñüßë‚Äçüé®
item.description:
My experience working alongside ChatGPT to generate OpenAPI specs.

As part of a client job (as a newly-minted freelancer!) I got, I needed to design an API. I decided to write an OpenAPI spec. I’m so used to gRPC that looking at the OpenAPI JSONs and YAMLs doesn’t “gel” well in my brain, but I do know the basics of API design. And, well…

With that in mind, and since the project itself revolves around LLMs, I decided to write the spec together with ChatGPT. It went pretty well, so here are my thoughts and lessons learned.
